title: Edmonds gains 200-yards for second-straight week
text:
Edmonds gains 200-yards for second-straight week 
Updated: 
Posted by: Jason Bristol 
HARRISBURG -- Chase Edmonds is again putting up monster numbers at Fordham.The sophomore running back from CD East rushed for 230 yards and four touchdowns and also caught four passes for 49 yards and another score on Saturday in a 48-45 win at Penn. Surprisingly, Edmonds was not named the Patriot League's Offensive Player of Week for his efforts.The game was Edmonds' second straight 200-yard game and the fourth 200-yard rushing game of his career.He was named Corvias Patriot League Offensive Player of the Week on October 5, however; rushing 30 times for 234 yards and two scores in Fordham's 35-7 victory at Lafayette. 
Video used in this story is provided by Fordham Athletics. Related Stories
